description: Polymer web component behavior for multi-selectable elements, defining properties, methods, and behaviors for handling multiple selections in a Polymer-based project.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects the given value; toggles selection if multi is true, otherwise sets the selected value.

methods.name: multiChanged
methods.description: Observer for changes to the 'multi' property, updates the internal selection behavior.

methods.name: _updateSelected
methods.description: Updates the selection state based on current properties.

methods.name: _selectMulti
methods.description: Selects multiple values by updating the internal selection state.

methods.name: _selectionChange
methods.description: Handles changes in selection, updating selected items accordingly.

methods.name: _toggleSelected
methods.description: Toggles the selection state of a given value.
